name: Hydropolis
description:
Hydropolis is a puzzle game prototype where two players compete to fill their tanks by breaking open the blocks that fall on their boards.

How to Play

Get water to fill your tank by clearing blocks. Adjacent columns of blocks will clear if they're the same height. Fill your tank all the way to the top before your opponent can do the same, and you win! Be careful not let your block columns go past the top of your tank, or you'll lose a lot of water!

(Resetting the game will require refreshing the page)

Pro Strats
  • Earn items to mess with your opponent by clearing 3 or more columns at the same time
  • Increase your multiplier by clearing columns at the exact height of the yellow multiplier box. Clearing columns of a different height will reset your multiplier.

Created by Clara Ng and Konstantin Boyko.
